notes: The damage and movement speed slow are only applied to enemy targets. ↓↓ Double-tapping automatically target self.
Turns the target ethereal, disarming them, rendering them attack immune, and granting 100% physical damage resistance.
The projectile travels at a speed of 1275.
Checks the caster's primary attribute upon projectile hit.
Ether Blast first applies the ethereal debuff, then the damage, then the slow debuff. This means it effectively amplifies its own damage.
This means it effectively amplifies its own damage.
Reduces most heroes' total magic resistance to -5%.
The magic resistance reduction of multiple ethereal effects does not stack, the one with higher value takes priority.
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter-based items.
abilities.description: Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage. Enemy targets are also slowed by 80%, and take 1.5x your target's primary attribute + 50 as magical damage.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
5, 5 and 25 main attack damage to all / / heroes respectively.
name: Ethereal Blade
description: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
tips: Can be used in combination with Dagon for massive amounts of burst damage.
